description:
Charming & Effortless Family Living in Prime Locale

Ideally positioned in a family orientated and ultra convenient growing pocket, this delightful residence emphasises classical charm with a polished modern twist. Boasting a practical flowing floorplan, two bedrooms and an excellent entertaining courtyard, this home offers an exciting opportunity perfect for the young family, savvy investor or those looking to downsize.

ESSENTIALS & INCLUSIONS:

- Solid structure presenting a beautiful sandstone façade with a large and inviting front balcony
-Elegant living room with polished timber flooring effortlessly flowing through to the divine and airy dining area
- Immaculate open kitchen filled with natural light and well appointed with natural gas cooking, quality appliances and an abundance of storage space and preparation space
-Attractive, low maintenance outdoor entertaining space perfect for alfresco dining, with lined garden beds, leafy surrounds and a freestanding storage shed
-Two generously sized bedrooms each complete with desirable built in wardrobes
-Pristine bathroom with quality amenities
-Quality Inclusions: Internal laundry, large study area, split air conditioning, ample storage and more

LIFESTYLE & EDUCATION:

- Close to local favourites, The Pour Barista Cafe, Pepito's and the newly updated Marrickville Metro
- Local schools such as Marrickville West Primary School, Marrickville High School, and Tempe High School
- Moments to an array of parklands including Marrickville Park, Steel Park and Tillman Park
- Short stroll to public transport links, Marrickville and Sydenham Station

DISCLAIMER: While Richard Matthews Real Estate have taken all care in preparing this information and used their best endeavours to ensure that the information contained therein is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect of any errors, inaccuracies or misstatements contained herein. Richard Matthews Real Estate urge prospective purchasers to make their own inquiries to verify the information contained herein.
